name: Puja Bag
body:
**Name :** Puja Bag **Address :** Village : Bhuarah, P.S. : Bagnan, District : Howrah **Support Period :** Beneficiary since 2016 **Mentor :** Sandip Saha (Jadavpur University, Kolkata) **Educational Backgroud :** 86% ; Higher Secondary : 76%  **Present Course :** Zoology (UG I) Amta College

Puja grew up and studied in a remote village called Bhuarah, in Howrah. Her father is a lathe machine worker and scarcity has been their daily companion. Despite suffering from malnutrition and fatigue she was relentless in her academic pursuits. After securing 76% marks in her Higher Secondary Examinations, she joined Ramsaday College in Amta to study B.Sc. in Zoology. Srijan Sujan has been with her since the start of her bachelor’s course.
